name: Fool Oot
description:
Collect 1000 of each resource to win & try your best not to get killed in the process. Why stand still when you can constantly run?

This is my 3rd ever project & only my second ever finished project from around 6 months of active game dev. I have lots of plans for expansion to this game but in given the time restraints/lack of knowledge I had to keep it relatively simple, enjoy!

Poon
